name: promptbee
title: Promptbee
description: Search and copy your PromptBee prompts directly from Raycast.
author: shweshi

commands.name: search-prompts
commands.title: Search Prompts
commands.subtitle: PromptBee
commands.description: Search and copy prompts from your PromptBee library

commands.name: shared-prompts
commands.title: Shared Prompts
commands.subtitle: PromptBee
commands.description: View your shared prompts from your PromptBee library

commands.name: favourite-prompts
commands.title: Favourite Prompts
commands.subtitle: PromptBee
commands.description: View your favourite prompts from your PromptBee library

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
